word:
Since writing these communications, which ought to have been done some time ago, freedom has come to my soul. I have felt the approval of God in a marked degree; and now I shall not have time to copy this, I fear, and will send it as it is. With earnest interest for you and the work of God, I remain, 


                                    Your sister and fellow-laborer in Christ, 
                                                               Ellen G. White
